segments.text: Our supervisor Lester does . Actually , Lester is kind of like the kitchen god .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The kitchen god ? What does he do ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He just stays in the kitchen and watches you . Before the Chinese New Year , the kitchen god tells his boss whether you were good or bad this year . Just like Lester does !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , no ! I did a lot of bad things this year . I hope the kitchen god isn't like Lester--he blabs my mistakes to everybody !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Actually , there's a way to keep the kitchen god from telling the bad things you did .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What is it ? Tell me ! Will it work for Lester , too ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think so ! Just serve a lot of sweet dishes next week . That will make the kitchen god say sweet things about you !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hmm . Are you sure that will work ? I already tried giving chocolate to Lester .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: His face broke out and he said it was my fault !
segments.speaker: S2
